name: Insufficient market adoption (perceived price too high)
description: Competition from Samsung/LG with lower unit costs, risk of launch failure.
mitigation: Switch to Hardware-as-a-Service model: material price at cost + Zero-Waste app subscription (â‚¬5/month) to smooth customer CAPEX.
status: Plan approved, pricing test in progress
trigger: Pre-order conversion rate < 2% or beta churn > 15%
fallback: Reduce BOM by simplifying connectivity module if P&L remains negative

name: STM32 / CM5 shortage (supply chain MCU)
description: Supplier lead time > 12 weeks on critical semiconductors, blocks pilot production.
mitigation: Dual PCB footprint for compatible GigaDevice chip + second approved supplier; 8-week safety stock.
status: Footprint validated, buffer order in progress
trigger: Lead-time > 10 weeks or allocation < 60% of requirement
fallback: Switch pilot batch to RPi Compute Module with temporary SPI bridge

name: Camera lens condensation (embedded vision)
description: Blurry images when door opens -> incorrect item detection.
mitigation: 1W heating wire around lens + defog algorithm; climate chamber testing.
trigger: Invalid image rate > 5% on beta batch
fallback: Desiccant packet + EPDM seal while waiting for heating validation

name: AI false positives (item classification)
description: Apple/Tomato confusion causing incorrect waste-prevention alerts.
mitigation: Human-in-the-loop feedback in app, weekly retraining + dataset augmented with real fridge scenarios.
status: MLOps pipeline in place, active beta collection
fallback: Disable auto-suggestions and switch to user confirmation mode

name: EMC/EMI certification failure
description: Risk of radiation exceedance leading to lab rejection and market launch delay.
mitigation: Faraday cages on PCB, ferrite beads, internal pre-cert test plan; design audit by partner lab.
fallback: Add shield can to RF module and rapid re-spin

name: Cloud latency > 3s on app
description: Unstable client Wi-Fi connection, degraded UX on notifications and inventory.
mitigation: Edge-first architecture: local processing on RPi5, offline cache + deferred synchronization; compressed images via CDN.
trigger: p95 API latency > 3s or timeout rate > 2%
fallback: Degraded mode without images, local notifications only

name: High defect rate in pilot production
description: Assembly defects or faulty components exceeding 5% on first batch.
mitigation: Implementation of automated test bench (FCT) at end-of-line + Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI).
fallback: Manual rework of defective boards and supplier audit
